description: Reset specific users or settings for the current server.
usage: Reset specific settings for the current server.
all: Are you sure you want to delete **ALL** settings?
textExp: Are you sure you want to delete **all text exp**?
textExpSuccess: **Text exp** for all members have been reset.
kothExp: Are you sure you want to delete **all koth exp**?
kothExpSuccess: **Koth exp** for all members have been reset.
voiceExp: Are you sure you want to delete **all voice exp**?
voiceExpSuccess: **Voice exp** for all members have been reset.
settings: Are you sure you want to delete **%s** settings?
success: Reset for **%s** settings has been cancelled.
user: Are you sure you want to delete all user data for %s.
userSuccess: Data for user %s has been reset.
